summary: AN ORDINANCE accepting electrical underground distribution easements over portions of Section 21, Township 26 North, Range 4 East, W.M.; Fir View Terrace; Albert Belch's Wedgewood No. 4; Section 25, Township 25 North, Range 3 East, W.M.; Lake Forest Park Estates; Maplewild Terraces; Seahurst Park, as described below and placing said easements under the jurisdiction of the City Light Department.
